description.default: 极富现代感的类 macOS 主题，以轻量、极简的风格，带来优雅、高效的笔记体验。ps：如需顶栏常驻请查看「主题特性」👇
description.zh_CN: 极富现代感的类 macOS 主题，以轻量、极简的风格，带来优雅、高效的笔记体验。ps：如需顶栏常驻请查看「主题特性」👇
description.en_US: An ultra-modern macOS-like theme that offers a lightweight and minimalistic style, providing an elegant and efficient note-taking experience. ps: to pin the top bar, please check Theme Features below 👇
